item.title: Can someone help me fix my blitz spell?
item.dc:creator: @Evanz Evanz
item.description:
@Evanz wrote:

[quote=“adog17x, post:3, topic:192673”] delete

                } else if ((playerHasItemAmount(560, 200) == true)
                        && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 100) == true)
                        && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 300) == true)) {
                    startAnimation(1978);
                    castOnPlayer.specialAmount = 100;
                    inCombat();
                    stillgfx(336, absY, absX);
                    stillgfx(465, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX);
                    castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You Have Been Spec Restored!");
                    deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 200); 
                    deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 100); 
                    deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(555), 300); 
                sendMessage("You Spec Restore you Team Mate..");
                    teleportToX = absX;
                    teleportToY = absY;[/quote]

then she/he would only have hals a code… a half that dosnt do damage… dosnt do a gfx… dosnt delete runes… or anything

item.title: Can someone help me fix my blitz spell?
item.dc:creator: @Evanz Evanz
item.description:
@Evanz wrote:

make a backup of your client.java firts.

then try replacing yours with this

if(spellID == 12871) // ice blitz (lvl 82 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 99) { if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 20)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 10)==false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 30)==false)) { sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); sendMessage("You need 20 "+getItemName(560)+", 10 "+getItemName(4278)+" and 30 "+getItemName(555)); } else if((playerHasItemAmount(560, 20)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(4278, 10)==true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 30)==true)) { startAnimation(1978); hitDiff = 6 + misc.random(20); castOnPlayer.entangle(); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); stillgfx(368, absY, absX); stillgfx(367, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You are frozen!"); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 20); deleteItem(4278, getItemSlot(4278), 10); deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(555), 30); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 89) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 99 to cast this spell."); } }

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone help me fix my blitz spell?

item.title: Can someone help me fix my blitz spell?
item.dc:creator: @sw1tchez sw1tchez
item.description:
@sw1tchez wrote:

okay, well when you blitz someone it like “spec restores” them, and i dont want it to do that i want it to hit them.

this is my ice blitz code in my client.java

if (spellID == 12871) // ice blitz (lvl 82 spell) { if (playerLevel[6] >= 99) { if ((playerHasItemAmount(560, 20) == false) || (playerHasItemAmount(565, 10) == false) || (playerHasItemAmount(555, 30) == false)) { sendMessage( "You do not have enough runes to cast this spell."); sendMessage( "You need 20 " + getItemName(560) + ", 10 " + getItemName(565) + " and 30 " + getItemName(555)); } else if ((playerHasItemAmount(560, 200) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(565, 100) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(555, 300) == true)) { startAnimation(1978); castOnPlayer.specialAmount = 100; inCombat(); stillgfx(336, absY, absX); stillgfx(465, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You Have Been Spec Restored!"); deleteItem(560, getItemSlot(560), 200); deleteItem(565, getItemSlot(565), 100); deleteItem(555, getItemSlot(555), 300); sendMessage("You Spec Restore you Team Mate.."); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY;

Read full topic
